name: USA Simon Says - Copy Cat iSay
name_original: USA Simon Says - Copy Cat iSay
description:
Here's how you play: watch the colors and mimic the sequence of cool electronic sounds. Every round adds another tone and increases the difficulty.

How long can you memorise the pattern? How many rounds can you survive? Keep your memory sharp and beat your friends.

Who says a little competition isn’t healthy? Perfect for some quick fun while you’re on the go, this game is also great for warming up for a big study session and for improving hand-eye coordination. Play it with the whole family and use the game to entertain your kids.

Be careful: this game may be simple, but it is extremely addictive!

…….TOP FEATURES…….

+ Beautiful USA Simon Says graphics and sounds
+ 8 themes with custom sound effects:

* Kids Mode
* Baseball
* Hollywood
* Los Angeles
* Basketball
* New York
* Football
* Cars

+ Lightning-fast game responses
+ Multiplayer mode for competing against friends
+ Expert mode for even more challenges
+ Speed mode for a new level of difficulty
+ Freestyle mode for just having fun
+ Cute Kids mode (slower to help them keep up)
+ Facebook and Twitter for sending challenges to friends
+ On/Off button for sound
+ Support for iPhone, iPod, and iPad!
